channel.title: Java on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)

item.title: AKash
item.description: AKash is a simple Banking Application using Java & JavaFX Dependencies JDK 11+ JAVAFX for Java 9+ How to run? In the release folder, you’ll find Jar Files Edit the script files (.bat for windows/.sh for linux) according to your settings Execute the script files (First Server, then Client) How to use You can use command line of Server to execute ADMIN works

item.title: Messenger
item.description: A Simple Multi-Client Messenger with Java Socket Networking… [ Java Executable Link Given Below ] Just like any other messenger, It has Sign Up and Log in Sorting User Depending on Recent Activity Unread Message Batch Real time message update (with Customizable Frequency 1Hz) Black Theme :3 Screenshots

item.title: Java Environment Setup
item.description: JDK and JRE Setup JRE not needed for Version > 10 Download Java LTS (Java 8, Java 11, …) Oracle JDK 11 Amazon Correto 11 Zulu (includes JavaFX auto in JDK11) Intellij (>2019.1) comes with bundled JDK which includes JavaFX Java Path Variable Setup Windows Go to “Advanced System Settings”: Go to “Environment Variable” Add New System Variable named “JAVA_HOME” where you have installed your JDK Edit Path in System Variable and add the location where “javac.
